comment: Because its the right thing that they SHOULD do!
commentable_entity.ask: Public apology from Disney to Johnny Depp!
commentable_entity.title: Public apology from Disney to Johnny Depp!
commentable_entity.description: In the event of Johnny Depp winning the trial against Amber Heard, Disney and all other companies that took her word without any thought should publicly apologies to JD for the HUGE losses of reputation, money and LIFE!

commentable_entity.display_title: Public apology from Disney to Johnny Depp!
